column4: Hi! I need a driver to sis671 because vesa makes browsing the web too tiring. Anyone knows a good solution for me?
get a better supported card is the honest advice, SIS has poor support in Linux
the only way I can get a better card is getting a better computer. I'm not going to put my notebook in the trash
you may have to accept the limitations of the poor SIS card, there are SIS xorg modules, but they are very hit and miss
